name: Demons (dazz)
description:
Demons, a twin stick bullet hell game with boss fights made for a gamejam in 72 hours.

Check out other entries to the jam here!

Made with Godot and Aseprite.

Boss Music by Brad Podray http://maximalismmusic.com/

KenPixel font by http://kenney.nl/

and lots of free sounds from https://gamesounds.xyz

Mac and Linux builds are untested!
